episodes.title: Next With Nick - Shane Jessop
episodes.description: Alright, get ready for a wild ride on this one. We've got Shane Jessop in the house on 'Next With Nick,' and let me tell you, this dude's life reads like a novel you can't put down. Shane's a jack-of-all-trades—singer, songwriter, author, you name it. He's got his hands in everything from farming to real estate development. But here's the kicker that's gonna throw you for a loop: he's an ex-cult member. Yeah, you heard that right. His escape from a life most of us can't even imagine until he was 23 is nothing short of a movie script. The leap from that world to where he is now? Huge. The cost? Massive. But Shane's outlook on life, his unquenchable thirst for creating something meaningful, and, get this, his ambition to model for Levi's—man, it's just inspiring. There's an energy and a drive in him that you can't help but admire. And guess what? He's channeling all that into writing a book about his journey. If his story doesn't make you want to grab life by the horns, I don't know what will. This book's going to explode, no doubt about it. So, folks, buckle up. Shane Jessop's in the building, and this conversation is going to be one hell of a trip. Let's dive in and get the full scoop on this incredible journey from cult life to living large and in charge. Shane, welcome to the show, brother. @jessopshane on Instagram. I am @nickjohnston007 on Instagram!
